expo.name: Accountabl

infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: Accountabl needs access to your contacts to add accountability partners.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Accountabl needs camera access to scan QR codes for adding partners.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Accountabl needs photo library access to save QR codes.
infoPlist.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: This identifier will be used to deliver personalized ads to you.

expo.description: Track your screen time and share progress with accountability partners. Set daily goals, add accountability partners, and receive automatic updates to stay on track with your digital wellness journey.
